How Telehealth Works in Florida

Book online • Complete forms • Join secure video visit

Schedule an appointment here — Start Your Visit

Fill out patient forms. Approx. 5–10 min.

Receive a confirmation email with link to join visit — see our FAQs

Attend your virtual visit with link provided

*$65/visit applies to simple visit

**All fees are subject to change. All charges are NON-REFUNDABLE once a virtual connection has been made, attempted and/or services are rendered; regardless of outcome. See terms and conditions.
